name: Escape Plan-TTRPG
description: Escape Plan is a combat-heavy TTRPG—the background sets in a zombie apocalypse world. The game moves from cooperating to killing each other, making it highly psychological and unpredictable. Players have to search for hints and items to strengthen their combat capabilities. Work with other players to bring down the mega infected that guards the magnetic card. Investigate, and find the "Traitor" hidden among the prison inmates who know this operation's true purpose-a serum that can only save one. Remember that there are no forever allies if your life is on edge.
